name: The Cube (itch) (Jack Le Hamster)
description:
The Cube is an experimental game produced for #indiesvspewdiepie game jam (made in 72h last weekend).

You can put your own image in the avatar. You also play against ghosts of former players.

If you like the game, please vote:

http://jams.gamejolt.io/indiesvspewdiepie/games/the-cube/39562
